rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with ample natural light and Vastu-compliant east-facing windows to invite positivity.
Spacious living room integrated with a semi-open kitchen, north or east facing as per Vastu for harmony and energy balance.
Modern kitchen located towards the south-east, designed for efficient workflow and adherence to Vastu principles regarding food preparation areas.
Dining area adjacent to the living room with natural lighting and east-west exposure.
Primary bedroom located in a north or east direction per Vastu, featuring a spacious balcony for relaxation and energy circulation.
Secondary bedroom in the west or north region as per local norms, also includes a small balcony to ensure light penetration.
Functional bathroom integrated with plumbing and ventilation; ideally placed away from main living areas in line with Vastu guidelines.
